params.specContent:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: 測試 API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /users:
    post:
      summary: 建立使用者
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                email:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '201':
          description: 使用者建立成功
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
                  name:
                    type: string
                  email:
                    type: string
params.flowContent:
name: 使用者建立測試流程
baseUrl: ${SPEC_PILOT_BASE_URL}
auth:
  type: bearer
  token: ${SPEC_PILOT_TOKEN}
steps:
  - name: 建立新使用者
    request:
      method: POST
      path: /users
      body:
        name: 測試使用者
        email: test@example.com
    validation:
      statusCode: 201
      schema:
        component: '#/paths//users/post/responses/201/content/application~1json/schema'
      customRules:
        - field: id
          rule: notNull
        - field: name
          rule: regex
          pattern: '^測試.*'
        - field: email
          rule: contains
          value: '@example.com'
